start.text: I've got a ton of things I want to tell the people I'm going to kill!
It's a ritual. A ritual to end the lives of men.
It'll make a fine sideshow for our scheme to kill a million people.
Imagine you're just about to be killed. Why am I going to be killed, you ask?
Gunnery is about killing the people on board.
We seek not a conflict, but rather a restoration of balance. A judgement.

start_boss.text: It's salvation on a far grander scale.
How many must we sacrifice to put them to rest?
Don't you see? A million lives are about to be snuffed out in senseless cruelty.
We must save those souls that died chained to the prison of ethics!
The world shall be horrified by the number of lives we will take.

retreat.text: He walked all over it with his dirty boots! Over the crisp, white sheets of my bed that I had just made!

engaged.text: Let me tell you a story. Back when I was a gunnery officer...

need_help.text: Your lives carry weight! It gives you the right to take the lives of others!
We'll have to kill them all if we are to live!
What we have to do is simple. I give the orders and you snuff out the target!

pursuing.text: That'll be another few hundred lives taken.
You shall be a part of our salvation.

running.text: It seems we're not done yet.
Go die! You have permission to take off!

hull_90.text: That's it! Keep firing! Crush their lives under the weight of your lead!
I will not allow our perseverance to be desecrated!
Yes! Do you see the lives being lost?

hull_50.text: If you wish to live, then you must let go of your life!
Be not afraid! Did you not leave your fears behind at the bottom of the abyss?

hull_30.text: Because they wanted to steal from you, to torment you, to burn you, to cut you apart!
Imagine! It was for your sins, your actions and your vengeance! There has to be a reason!

overload.text: The souls of the dead are coming together like the pieces of a puzzle!
What do you know of beauty?
That is what makes it elegant!
A sign of an ill omen!

death.text: Don't you see? One million! One million lives!

victory.text: That did make for a good sideshow.
Only then will they let go of their weapons.
Let me know when the bodies... I mean the debris stops raining.

victory_boss.text: Then sprinkle death over all of it, and the formula is complete!
